data.description: The Ecological Benefits Framework was created by The Lexicon, a California-based NGO, and developed with an unprecedented collection of nearly 200 domain experts from across the globe. It is being adopted by a diverse set of actors. Investors and philanthropists have begun using it to classify their portfolio impacts; project developers have a new way to express the impacts they create; and web3 pioneers are developing a range of new digital assets.
data.title: Ecological Benefits Framework Activator

data.reason:
EBF Activator was the consolidation of this new language that we at Kokonut Network consider it the "Future of ReFi"

[EBF Website](https://www.canyouchangethefuture.org/meet-the-team/)

data.reason:
The Green Paper for Kokonut V1 a research tailored to our land size, location, weather and soil type.

The 6 month work has been completed recently in November 22 in Spanish.

We're working on translation in order to release the "**Request for Comments**" version of this work.

data.text:
#GG18 was a blast for us, we got massive support from the community and ranked #13 in the Climate Solutions Round

The work completed during this time frame was instrumental in order to prepare for the next phase of Kokonut Network development.

Now Kokonut DAO is more friendly for communities to join as the barrier of entry been lowered by the introduction of "fractional shares"

Kokonut V1 Green Paper will bring a lot of clarity for the DAO Members and community as a whole.

Check out our first ever AMA, we went deep into the questions of the community.

**Thank you for the Support üíö**

data.description: Green Paper Alpha Release for the community to review and leave comments on it before we send it to the Kokonut DAO for ratification.
data.title: Kokonut V1 Green Paper "Request for Comments"

data.reason:
We have decided to move away from a rigid document that becomes obsolete as we're advancing in our mission toward an **evergreen approach**; meaning that we aren't building a "**Static Paper**" anymore, and instead we will focus our efforts into leveraging the [Kokonut Framework](https://framework.kokonut.network/) as we understand this is a streamlined way to aggregate our efforts but also foster **Wisdom of Crowds** by design, because the framework is OSS hosted in [GitHub](https://github.com/wasalo/kokonut-framework).

The Green Paper will now live at the [Kokonut Wiki](https://docs.kokonut.network/) and will be continuously updated and maintained over time.

We have decided to move away from a rigid document that becomes obsolete as we're advancing in our mission toward an **evergreen approach**; meaning that we aren't building a "**Static Paper**" anymore, and instead we will focus our efforts into leveraging the [Kokonut Framework](https://framework.kokonut.network/) as we understand this is a streamlined way to aggregate our efforts but also foster **Wisdom of Crowds** by design, because the framework is OSS hosted in [GitHub](https://github.com/wasalo/kokonut-framework).

The Green Paper will now live at the [Kokonut Wiki](https://docs.kokonut.network/) and will be continuously updated and maintained over time.

The scope of this work has evolved into the thesis for the [Kokonut Foundation](https://kokonut.foundation/).

The [foundation](https://twitter.com/KokonutFDN) will keep developing and building on the previous work of Regenerating Treasuries with Coconuts.

This work has been integrated into the Kokonut Framework and the foundation will be leveraging the framework to create Purpose-based Natural Assets

data.title: Full Fledge Budget for Kokonut V1

data.reason: The Budget has been completed; full version will be available at https://kokonut.network/kokonut-v1
The Budget has been completed; full version will be available at https://kokonut.network/kokonut-v1

data.text:
As a prerequisite to the release of the **Kokonut Green Paper V1,** we have just released the [Kokonut Framework Alpha Version](https://github.com/wasalo/kokonut-framework) in plain text format.

Next step is to work on the **Diagram Flowchart & Framework Canvas**; essential components needed to craft the **Green Paper V1 Request For Comments Version**.

The request for comments version will be peer-reviewed by highly aligned individuals in the **ReFi Ecosystem**, and **Kokonut Advisors** using Fileverse dDocs in order to foster transparency through the process.

The [Kokonut Core](https://kokonut.network/about) team will engage with the community in this process and merge the recommendations in order to release the **Green Paper V1** which is the prerequisite to launch, design and develop Commercial-grade Syntropic Farms.
data.title: We've completed pre-requisites to the Green Paper

data.text:
gm, we know the Green Paper for Kokonut Network has been delayed, but we promise it will be worthwhile.

We've developed a **methodology** to **reduce** time to **cash flow** by incorporating several crops along the development journey that would help us **improve** every **pillar** of the thesis.

Right now we're incorporating the learning from **Kokonut Genesis** and **Kokonut Seeds** into the paper and we will be launching it very soon as we validate our findings.

Learn more about our journey at [@KokonutNetwork](https://twitter.com/kokonutnetwork)
data.title: Kokonut Green Paper [delayed

data.text: This grant was instrumental to set the foundations of the Kokonut Ecosystem, when it comes to the Kokonut Syntropic Farms & Real World Assets Framework, DAO Governance Initial Framework as a Pre-face of the Kokonut DAO Constitution & Streamlined Website Structure.

data.text: Every milestone linked below has been completed, proof is attached.
Very important set of milestones in the development of Kokonut Network

data.name: Gitcoin
data.description: Gitcoin creates solutions that empower digitally native communities to fund, build, and protect what matters.

Milestone to track the establishment of the needed infrastructure for [Kokonut Genesis](https://x.com/KokonutNetwork/status/1786029806380863503) to become a Local Training Center for Kids, Youth, Farmers, and everyone else in learning organic methodologies to Syntropic Agriculture
data.title: Kokonut Genesis as a Organic Agriculture Training Site

data.reason:
This milestone has been completed due to the fact that Kokonut Genesis has become our headquarters for training contributors in the Fertilizers Biofactory to produce everything our crops needs to thrive, and now they're applying these new learn techniques to take care of Kokonut Seeds farm. Providing some metrics about this work below.

### **Economic Impact**
- **Bio-factory Monthly Operating Expenses:** US$800 (salaries, supplies, maintenance).
### **Social Impact**
- **Job Creation & Local Economic Boost:**
    - **37 temporary workers** during the development phase.
    - **5 permanent employees** (+1 security guard), ensuring stable employment.
    - **Additional benefits:** Training, meals, and insurance.
- **Community Impact:**
	- Provides **stable income for 6 families**.
	- Potential for **future expansion and additional hiring**.
### **Environmental Impact**
**Soil Regeneration Practices:**
- Use of **corn, broccoli, parsley, and peanuts** to improve soil fertility.
- **Bioles (liquid organic fertilizers)** to reduce reliance on chemical fertilizers.
#### **Environmental Impact Measurements**
**Biomass generation and carbon sequestration:** Carbon capture estimates could be made based on crop selection and biomass production.
##### **Bioles Production**
- **Humic Acid:** 962 gallons
- **Liquid Microorganisms:** 624 gallons
- **Neem Solution:** 518 gallons
- **Organic Urea:** 858 gallons
- **Sargassum Solution:** 264 gallons
- **Water Glass (Silicate Solution):** 20 lbs
##### **Minerals & Organic Components**
- **Ash/Charcoal:** 60 bags (~100 lbs per bag)
- **Biochar:** 90 sacks (produced using pyrolytic kilns)
- **Minerals:** 7 bags (~100 lbs per bag) = 700 lbs
- **Manure:** 75 bags (each weighing 25 lbs)
##### **Soil Quality and Biodiversity**
We're in the process of implementing measurements for **organic matter content, water retention, and biodiversity of insects and microorganisms**.
### **Conclusion**
‚úÖ **Strong positive economic impact:** The project is profitable within the first year.  
‚úÖ **Significant social impact:** Direct job creation and community benefits.  
‚úÖ **Good environmental practices:** However, **further measurements** are needed to **quantify the real environmental impact**.
### **Suggested Next Steps**
üîπ Measure **bioles application rate per hectare.  
üîπ Quantify **biomass generation** and its role in **carbon sequestration**.  
üîπ Conduct **annual soil quality assessments** to track improvements.

data.description: This is a milestone to track the development of the Planting Phase of [Kokonut Genesis Farm](https://x.com/KokonutNetwork/status/1783916620500357173)
data.title: Kokonut Genesis Planting Phase Development

data.reason: We have reached the planting phase in Kokonut Genesis, check out the [YouTube video](https://youtu.be/p72i_xF4wvk?si=vSUQwYorTiwDz8AM) we uploaded and a related [tweet](https://x.com/KokonutNetwork/status/1808493194142765556).

We have reached the planting phase in Kokonut Genesis, check out the [YouTube video](https://youtu.be/p72i_xF4wvk?si=vSUQwYorTiwDz8AM) we uploaded and a related [tweet](https://x.com/KokonutNetwork/status/1808493194142765556).

data.text:
As part of the development of this milestone to achieve the Training Site status we have built a fertilizers, minerals, and microorganism Bio-factory for us to produce everything we need to take care of the soil and the plants, but also can provide credit lines to the community members that undergo our training.

Video Series of the Bio-factory development in our [YouTube channel](https://youtube.com/@kokonutnetwork?si=Hg5akgKUJipwkU4f)
data.title: Kokonut Genesis Bio-factory

data.text:
### **Economic Impact**
- **Bio-factory Monthly Operating Expenses:** US$800 (salaries, supplies, maintenance).
### **Social Impact**
- **Job Creation & Local Economic Boost:**
    - **37 temporary workers** during the development phase.
    - **5 permanent employees** (+1 security guard), ensuring stable employment.

	- Provides **stable income for 6 families**.
	- Potential for **future expansion and additional hiring**.

- **Sargassum Solution:** 264 gallons

- **Biochar:** 90 sacks (produced using pyrolytic kilns)

- **Manure:** 75 bags (each weighing 25 lbs)

### **Suggested Next Steps**
üîπ Measure **bioles application rate per hectare.  
üîπ Quantify **biomass generation** and its role in **carbon sequestration**.  
üîπ Conduct **annual soil quality assessments** to track improvements.

data.name: Climate Coordination Network
data.description: Climate Coordination Network

Our project was selected to be part of the [GG20 Celo Public Goods Climate Bonus Round](https://mirror.xyz/celopg.eth/McicejfzasLM0nD5HKNdPukgQHvVrRVT2GiFwwzf8AA).

### **Celo Claim:**

Other (please explain below)

We would love to enter into the CELO ecosystem and leverage its technology for a dedicated effort that based on our market research could make it a great fit to be executed on the CELO Rails.

Leverage cStables & Celo SAFE to bootstrap a low-interest Loans Program for the Community of Farmers who adapt to use our planting methodologies, the Kokonut Framework or Enroll into our Training Program to be developed in the Kokonut Genesis Project.

We think that a Loans Program is the right onboarding tool to implement other solutions like Hypercerts, Karma GAP and EBF Framework to measure local community impact for our efforts.

If we were to be approved into the program, we could use the matching funds to bootstrap the program, by starting with a Local Exchanger of cStables that act as the Clearing House for the local community to turn their Tokens into Fiat and Vice versa.

We will be donating the yield generated by the initiative to the Kokonut Foundation to support their initiatives and further development & augmentation of the value by leveraging the Foundation's Perpetual Value Flywheel

Kokonut Genesis Video: https://youtu.be/dahodOC6Aa0?si=SzJSNZmppMMeKDbC

[Diagram v0.2 - KKN Foundation.png](https://storage.tally.so/private/Diagram-v0.2---KKN-Foundation.png?id=MNNvNp&accessToken=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpZCI6Ik1OTnZOcCIsImZvcm1JZCI6Ind2Tk5KZyIsImlhdCI6MTcxNTIyNzM2Mn0.MoO1zo77s1EAUtbC3uLCkyMVhGxb4pVqjeM8OQrlB-I&signature=e4dceec38a18ffc92eaf11c81787141d89d8f9a389f4cafb514a664c9e49b883) - - -

data.description:
This milestone is to track the development of "Kokonut Venus" 100% women-based leadership to grow beyond fruits & vegetables.

As we promised in our grant proposal, the funds raised in this round will go toward the funding and development of our new 100% women leadership farm.
data.title: Kokonut Venus Farm

data.reason:
We didn't meet our funding goals during GG21 Climate Solutions round in order to kick-start the development of Kokonut Venus Farm, and we redirected this funding to sustain and keep funding the development of [Kokonut Seeds](https://kokonut.network/seeds) which was already on its development phase thanks to a grant from the [ReFi on Arbitrum Program](https://app.charmverse.io/permalink/0c775aca-599c-4f92-bed4-84cfe8c7e5ce).

- We had to take this measure due to the fact that the Arbitrum Grant lost almost 50% of its value due to market conditions.
- What we did was to streamline the usage of the funding and built a more robust infrastructure at Kokonut Seeds in order to also serve the needs of Kokonut Venus later on.
- Kokonut Seeds & Kokonut Venus will share some of its infrastructure like Water Reservoir (We build two reservoirs at Seeds) and Electrical Infrastructure due to the proximity of both projects.

We didn't meet our funding goals during GG21 Climate Solutions round in order to kick-start the development of Kokonut Venus Farm, and we redirected this funding to sustain and keep funding the development of [Kokonut Seeds](https://kokonut.network/seeds) which was already on its development phase thanks to a grant from the [ReFi on Arbitrum Program](https://app.charmverse.io/permalink/0c775aca-599c-4f92-bed4-84cfe8c7e5ce).

- We had to take this measure due to the fact that the Arbitrum Grant lost almost 50% of its value due to market conditions.
- What we did was to streamline the usage of the funding and built a more robust infrastructure at Kokonut Seeds in order to also serve the needs of Kokonut Venus later on.
- Kokonut Seeds & Kokonut Venus will share some of its infrastructure like Water Reservoir (We build two reservoirs at Seeds) and Electrical Infrastructure due to the proximity of both projects.

data.text:
I'm glad to provide an update about Kokonut Venus Farm; we received the forecasted development budget from the on-the-ground team and local contractors.

We will process the information and add it to the Kokonut Hub for further reporting on its budget usage and development activities.
data.title: Development Budget & Roadmap

data.text:
We had a great learning this time, and it is when it comes to Quadratic Funding Rounds you need to set milestones after the funding round results are posted, so you can plan accordingly; if trying to accomplish Real World activities.

Also, that when it comes to Ecosystem Grants like ReFi on Arbitrum, you need to take in account market conditions that may affect the usage of funding for real world developments like ours.

data.title: Strengthen Climate-Impact Focus
data.description:
### **Action Items:**
  1. **Organic vs. Regenerative**
     * Define how practices go beyond organic (e.g., minimal tillage, polycultures).
  2. **GHG Emissions Tracking**
     * Implement a GHG inventory: farm equipment, transport, input production.
### **Deliverables:**
  * Regenerative agriculture practices checklist.
  * Transport emissions assessment & mitigation plan.
  * GHG inventory template and initial data.

data.title: Detail Carbon Sequestration & GHG Reduction
data.description:
### **Action Items:**
  1. **Research & Document**
     * Coconut tree carbon sequestration rates (above- and below-ground).
     * Compare rates vs. common hardwoods and fast-growing species.
  2. **Underplanting Strategy**
     * Define companion species (cover crops, nitrogen-fixers) and their sequestration benefits.
     * Draft an underplanting plan with species selection rationale.
  3. **Soil Sequestration Measurement**
     * Select soil carbon measurement methods (e.g., soil cores, remote sensing).
     * Define baseline soil carbon levels and sampling intervals.
### **Deliverables:**
  * Sequestration comparison report (coconut vs. other trees).
  * Underplanting plan document.
  * Soil sampling protocol & baseline data report.

questions.query: Is your project a member or past grantee of one of these networks?
What are your key active goals, plans, objectives or milestones for this year?
questions.explanation:
# What's Coming Next in Kokonut Network 2025
* **Kokonut Adelphi Farm**: First farm optimized as a Public Good leveraging our Public Goods Funding Powered by Trees Flywheel.
* **Kokonut Venus Farm**: 100% women-based leadership to grow beyond fruits & vegetables
* **Kokonut Green Paper:** Request for Comments Version
* **Local ReFi Toolkit Playbook:** How to set up a Web3-powered syntropic farm using the [Kokonut Framework](https://framework.kokonut.network/)
* **The first Celo-based Instance of Kokonut DAO**: Trees tied to token governance, on-chain revenue allocations, and a public goods funding model.
* **Deeper Integration with the Regen Coordination Stack**: Karma GAP, Hypercerts and Silvi (already in use at Kokonut Adelphi), and explore synergy with local stablecoin pilots & Celo-powered on-chain governance.
* **Increased Public Building Approach**: We will transition our Public Roadmap and Project Management to [Kokonut Network Github Repository](https://github.com/wasalo/kokonut-network) to foster collaborations with the wider ecosystem.

data.title: Regen Coordination x Kokonut - ReFi Toolkit
data.description: How to set up a Web3-powered syntropic farm using the [Kokonut Framework](https://framework.kokonut.network/).

data.title: Deeper Integration with Regen Coordination Stack

data.name: Regen Coordination
data.description: The Regen Coordination Round is a proposal for a GG21 community round centered on the themes of Coordi-nations 3, Cosmo-localism 2, Bio-Regionalism 3, and Regenerative Finance (ReFi) 3. Bringing together GreenPill Network 1, ReFi DAO 1, Celo Regional DAOs 1 and Regens Unite 1, we aim to support a global movement of regenerative communities leveraging Web3 for real-world impact and addressing local needs. The round will feed into a program to support the further development of local community impact tracking methodologies, grant tooling interoperability, and integrated QF & RPGF. We have currently secured $60K in funding from Celo Public Goods, ReFi DAO and Greenpill and ask for Gitcoin‚Äôs backing as we embark on a shared mission to showcase how community coordination, Web3, and innovative financial mechanisms can enable ecological and social regeneration on a global scale.

data.title: Public Nouns Grants
data.description:
The [Proposal #69](https://publicnouns.wtf/vote/69) at [Public Nouns](https://publicnouns.wtf/) is a funding request to build the [critical infrastructure](https://docs.kokonut.network/kokonut-farms/adelphi/crops-biodiversity-and-infrastructure) to reach the planting phase at [Kokonut Adelphi](https://docs.kokonut.network/kokonut-farms/adelphi).

One of the proposal outcomes is to stress test the Kokonut Adelphi x Public Nouns "Perpetual Value Flywheel powered by Biodiversity & Trees"

![image](https://kokonut.network/files/Kokonut_Adelphi_Public_Nouns_Value_Flywheel.png#align=%3Aalignment%2Fblock-center)

milestones.title: Kokonut Adelphi Farm Critical Infrastructure
milestones.description:
## Kokonut Adelphi Farm Critical Infrastructure Deliverables
 
1. Electrical Grid Infrastructure
2. Completion of House Construction
3. Water Reservoir Repair
4. Water Pump
5. Water Drip Irrigation System
6. Repair of Perimeter Fence
7. Organic Fertilizers, Minerals & Humid Acids Bio-Factory

data.title: Sustainable, Transparent & Impactful Feedback Loop
data.description:
* When it comes to Kokonut Adelphi as a whole; you can track its development, budget usage, and on-ground task completion via its designated page at [Kokonut Data Hub](https://hub.kokonut.network/projects/41)
* We will post the grant deliverables, milestones and updates about the Kokonut Adelphi general objectives at [Kokonut Network Karma GAP Profile](https://link.kokonut.network/karma).
* For the allocation to be received by the Kokonut Foundation reports on use of funds will be posted on the [Kokonut Foundation Karma GAP Profile](https://go.kokonut.foundation/karma).
* For the allocation to be received by GREEN FUND, it will be Stewarded by the Kokonut Green Gardens Council and proposals and initiative are transparently funded via Quadratic Voting.
  * **GREEN** is a new initiative designed to unite values-aligned builders in the regenerative Web3 space. It addresses the current fragmentation of ecological efforts by fostering collaboration, goal-setting, and coordination. GREEN empowers members to co-create ambitious, community-driven initiatives based on real-time sentiment and emerging trends. GREEN serves as a North Star for organizing and accelerating regenerative development across ReFi.
* Retrospective Impact Assessment on usage of Public Goods Funding Allocation will be conducted yearly, this report will be posted in Kokonut Green Gardens Community to guide voters when it's time to update the weight & beneficiaries receiving an allocation from the Splits Contract.

data.title: Proposal 69 Specific Outcomes
data.description:
## Proposal Specific Outcomes
* [Splits Contract](https://docs.splits.org/core/split-v2) funded by 40% of Kokonut Adelphi Quarterly Profits with Updatable Weights based on Conviction Voting using Wisdom of Crowds via Proposals Posted on Kokonut Green Gardens for Public Goods Funding Allocation
* Kokonut Green [Gardens Community](https://www.gardens.fund/) for Community Governance via Conviction Voting to transparently govern the Public Goods Funding Splits Contract.
  * This will be deployed on CELO to align around the Celo's mission and anyone can join by staking 6.9 $USDGLO. The voting weight of signaling pools will be based on [Quadratic Voting](https://docs.gardens.fund/coordination-hierarchy/images-and-media#quadratic).
* Improved [Kokonut Framework](https://framework.kokonut.network/) and Playbook for Public Goods Funding Use Case leveraging Syntropic Farms; empowering Communities to do similar projects using our [Open Source Framework](https://github.com/wasalo/kokonut-framework)
* Public Nouns Signage in Kokonut Adelphi multimedia and Lifetime Nouns-inspired Packaging for the Fruits & Vegetable Harvest with a QR Code linking back to Public Nouns Website
* Stress-test a Perpetual Value Flywheel that can be leveraged by other Nouns Branches to create Purpose-based Assets; *imagine a collaboration with **Purple DAO** and use the Public Goods Allocation to pay scholarships for Web3 Developers*.

data.title: Public Nouns Awareness
data.description:
## Public Nouns Awareness Deliverables

1. [Public Nouns x Kokonut Adelphi Flag](https://kokonut.network/files/Adelphi_Flag_Mockup.jpg)
2. Public Nouns x Kokonut Adelphi Contributors Uniform & Protective Equipment
3. Public Nouns Inspired [Vegetables & Fruits Packages](https://kokonut.network/files/Vegetetable_box_kkn_example2.jpg) By Kokonut Adelphi 1st Harvest
   1. To put visibility in perspective; 1st lettuce [harvest forecast](https://docs.kokonut.network/kokonut-farms/adelphi/crops-and-harvest-forecast) is 48K Units, this means the Nouns-inspired package will be featured in thousands of products.
4. Public Nouns In-store [Banners & Posters](https://kokonut.network/files/KKN_delphi_poster_supermarket.jpg) Kokonut Adelphi 4th Harvest
   1. Our goal is to market our products through one of the largest and most important supermarket chains in the country ([Supermercados Nacional](https://supermercadosnacional.com/)), which has 18 branches.
5. Public Nouns Brand Featured on a Short-film About Kokonut Adelphi Development
   1. This film will be produced mostly in-house as our contributors will be recording the development phases on daily basis and profesional equipment like drones and HD Cameras will be used on monthly basis to keep costs low, it will be performed by Kokonut Core Team.
6. Nouns Inspired Naming Rights: "***Kokonut Adelphi: A Nounish Community-Owned Syntropic Farm***"
   1. Every piece of multimedia, packaging and visuals will have this name on it, as this will be the official name of the project.
